hero.title: Magical Circus Days in Munich's East
hero.subtitle: Three days of circus art ‚Äì entertaining, thoughtful, humorous. Don't miss it.
hero.scarcity: 200 seats per show ‚Äì no seat reservations

artists.title: International Line-up
artists.description: Hand-picked artists from around the world

venue.title: Unique Setting
venue.description: In the geodesic dome in the heart of Ostpark

lineup.title: Line-up (first acts)
lineup.subtitle: More artists to follow

artists.name: The Nordic Council
artists.style: Juggling, acrobatics and live music merge in a powerful, poetic circus experience
artists.concept: Nordic magic art: The piece is humorous, surprising and profound ‚Äì inspired by everyday rituals in Scandinavia, transformed into movement and visual language

artists.name: Art for Rainy Days
artists.award: Winner of the Latvian Dance Awards 2023/2024
artists.style: Their performance combines elements from dance, circus and contemporary movement
artists.concept: They use physical expression forms, movement language and visual metaphors in their choreography
artists.recognition: The Latvian Dance Award is considered one of the highest honors in the field of dance/art in Latvia

lineup.moreActs: More acts will be added continuously.

detailed.title: Our Artists
detailed.subtitle: Get to know the international acts

schedule.title: Showtimes
schedule.subtitle: Entry 30 min. before start ‚Ä¢ free seating

items.title: Opening Night - Nordic Elegance
items.description: Experience the premiere with The Nordic Council. A show full of Nordic elegance and poetic acrobatics that opens the festival with style.

items.title: Matinee - Family Circus
items.description: The perfect afternoon show for families. Art for Rainy Days presents playful and interactive circus art that delights children and adults alike.
items.audience: Ideal for families with children from age 4

items.title: Evening Gala - Poetry in Motion
items.description: The main show of the festival! Both artist groups unite for a spectacular evening gala with the best acts from both shows.
items.artist: The Nordic Council & Art for Rainy Days

items.title: Sunday Matinee - Nordic Elegance
items.description: Relaxed Sunday afternoon with The Nordic Council. Enjoy Nordic circus poetry in a calm atmosphere - perfect for a cozy Sunday.
items.audience: Perfect for relaxed Sundays, from age 6

items.title: Finale - Art for Rainy Days
items.description: The grand finale of the festival! Art for Rainy Days bids farewell with an emotional and unforgettable closing performance.

highlights.title: Highlights
items: A place in Munich not to be missed

press.title: Press
press.quote: From November 14 to 16, the tent, supported by the Bavarian Dance Association (BLZV), will become Munich's headquarters for the Europe-wide action 'La nuit de la Cirque'.

location.title: Directions & Info
location.transport: Signage in the park ‚Ä¢ U-/S-Bahn connection ‚Ä¢ accessible

venue.title: Pepe Dome
venue.subtitle: A unique circus experience in a geodesic dome
venue.description: The Pepe Dome is a spectacular geodesic dome in the heart of Munich's Ostpark. With its unique architecture it offers the perfect atmosphere for contemporary circus art.

features.title: Geodesic Architecture
features.description: The dome creates an intimate yet generous atmosphere

features.title: Prime Location
features.description: Right in Ostpark with good connections

Signage in Ostpark. Google Maps leads to Pepe Dome at Theatron.

questions.q: Is it accessible and suitable for children?
questions.a: Yes. The show lasts approximately 75 minutes.
